content.text: The design of the telecommunications cabinets shall consider any requirements for the accommodation of  climate control equipment, power supplies (including uninterruptible power supplies), earth connection and  alarms systems to advise of unauthorised access.

requirements.text: The design of the telecommunications cabinets shall consider any requirements for the accommodation of  climate control equipment, power supplies (including uninterruptible power supplies), earth connection and  alarms systems to advise of unauthorised access.
